channel.title: Apple Keynotes
channel.itunes:author: Apple
channel.description: The Apple Keynotes podcast offers video of the company's most important announcements, including presentations by Apple CEO Tim Cook.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Video of Apple's most important announcements.
channel.itunes:summary: The Apple Keynotes podcast offers video of the company's most important announcements, including presentations by Apple CEO Tim Cook.
channel.itunes:keywords: keynote, mac, macintosh, osx, appletv, steven, ipod, iphone, presentation, sdk, xcode, ipad

item.title: Apple Special Event, October 2018
item.itunes:author: Apple Inc.
item.itunes:subtitle: Mac mini, MacBook Air, iPad Pro, Apple Pencil
item.itunes:summary: See Apple CEO Tim Cook and team introduce the new Mac mini, MacBook Air, iPad Pro with all-screen design, and second-generation Apple Pencil.

item.title: Apple Special Event, September 2018
item.itunes:author: Apple Inc.
item.itunes:subtitle: iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone XR, Apple Watch Series 4, HomePod
item.itunes:summary: See Apple CEO Tim Cook and team introduce iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone XR, Apple Watch Series 4, and the new HomePod features.

item.title: Apple WWDC 2018 Keynote Address
item.itunes:author: Apple
item.itunes:subtitle: iOS 12, ARKit2, Apple TV 4K with tvOS 12, watchOS 5, and macOS Mojave with a completely redesigned Mac App Store
item.itunes:summary: See Apple CEO Tim Cook and team unveil upgraded operating systems for iPhone and iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV.
